Change Log - Version 1.1.1

Bug

  • [BPEL-287] - Activity execution continues even tough the enclosing scope has terminated
  • [BPEL-288] - invocation cannot be terminated
  • [BPEL-292] - Code source for SOAPMessage class is null
  • [BPEL-293] - xsd files in nested directories break deployment

Feature Request

  • [BPEL-286] - SOAP Communication Exceptions should be catchable inside the process

Task

  • [BPEL-268] - provide a human task management example
  • [BPEL-289] - repeatUntil should execute until the condition becomes true, *not* as long as the condition evaluates to true
  • [BPEL-290] - Update examples to the WS-BPEL 2.0 OASIS Standard
  • [BPEL-291] - Document JBoss AS deployment order feature which causes exceptions upon restart
  • [BPEL-296] - ensure compatibility with jboss 4.2.3.GA
  • [BPEL-297] - incorporate jPDL 3.2.3 enterprise enhancements
  • [BPEL-298] - document transaction manager behavior in jboss 4.2
  • [BPEL-299] - document proxy warn logs
  • [BPEL-300] - prepare jbpm bpel 1.1.1 for release
